1. When only object 1 is on the machine, the light is on.
2. When object 0 is added to object 1, the light stays on.
3. When object 1 is removed (leaving only object 0), the light turns off.
4. When object 2 is added to object 0, the light turns on.
5. When object 0 is removed (leaving only object 2), the light turns off.
6. When object 1 is added alone again, the light turns on.

- Object 1 alone can turn on the machine (is a blicket)
- Object 0 alone cannot turn on the machine (not a blicket)
- Object 2 alone cannot turn on the machine (not a blicket)
- The machine turns on when at least one blicket is present
